description: A Denial-of-Service (DoS) vulnerability was discovered in F-Secure Atlant whereby the AVRDL unpacking module component used in certain F-Secure products can crash while scanning a fuzzed files. The exploit can be triggered remotely by an attacker. A successful attack will result in Denial-of-Service (DoS) of the Anti-Virus engine.

product.name: F-Secure endpoint protection products on Windows and Mac. F-Secure Linux Security (32-bit)  F-Secure Linux Security 64  F-Secure Atlant  F-Secure Cloud Protection for Salesforce and Cloud Protection for Microsoft Office 365
